turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you put in an order for me for a Caramel Machiato by the nearby starbucks on 4th Street in Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Definitely, what milk do you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tell them to add extra caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do. So to repeat, a grande Caramel Macchiato with 2% mlk and extra caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to ask for extra caramel on the side with a spoon?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is that possible?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Definitely. Do you want some cookies as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yes. I have a craving for some oatmeal cookies.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They don't sell that here. I remember they have a macadamia oat cookie. Would that work?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That's equally as good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will get you 3 cookies.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Tell them to charge it to my account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is now on order and will be ready for pickup shortly and that your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is awesome. Thank you again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem.
